charges.charge_description: 18:1517 OBSTRUCTION OF JUSTICE-INTERFERENCE: attempt to obstruct examination of a financial institution (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Michael Elder is sentenced to 2 years probation. Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $150.00, a fine of $1000.00 as to Count 1, and restitution of $2,864.00 to DuQuoin State Bank (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:2511 WIRE INTERCEPTION: aiding and abetting the endeavor to intercept wire communications (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Michael Elder is sentenced to 2 years probation. Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $150.00, a fine of $1000.00 as to Count 1, and restitution of $2,864.00 to DuQuoin State Bank (2)

charges.charge_description: 18:2511 WIRE INTERCEPTION: aiding and abetting the endeavor to intercept oral communications (3)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant Michael Elder is sentenced to 2 years probation. Defendant shall pay a special assessment of $150.00, a fine of $1000.00 as to Count 1, and restitution of $2,864.00 to DuQuoin State Bank (3)
